page.title: 18LOCHGOILHEAD_EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Lochgoilhead is fortunate in having little unemployment.The people are employed in a surprising variety of jobs.Jobs relating to tourism are the most common.Mr.D.Campbell is the main employer in the area.Many people,not only from Lochgoilhead,are empoled by him in his hotels,building firm,shops, bus service,cafe,farm and riding centre. Education,in its widest sense, employs quite a few people.(e.g. in the school,the outdoor centre,the scout centre).Some of the villagers are self-employed and some commute to Dunoon or Glasgow. The Naval Base employs quite a few civilians.Some of the villagers are Servicemen in the Royal Navy or the Merchant Navy. Some younger villagers had to leave to find work but generally Lochgoilhead can be considered fortunate.
